TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit UdpStatistics extends System.Object

summary.span: Provides User Datagram Protocol (UDP) statistical data.

span.span: Provides User Datagram Protocol (UDP) statistical data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Instanzen dieser Klasse werden zurückgegeben, durch die und Methoden Anwendungszugriff gewähren möchten UDP-Datenverkehr Informationen.Instances of this class are returned by the and methods to give applications access to UDP traffic information. Die Informationen in dieser Klasse korreliert werden, um den Verwaltungsobjekten-Informationen in der beschriebenen [ https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2013.txt ](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2013.txt).The information in this class correlates to the management information objects described in [https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2013.txt](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2013.txt). ## Examples Das folgende Codebeispiel zeigt die UDP-Statistiken für die angegebenen Adressfamilie.The following code example displays the UDP statistics for the specified address family. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#3)]

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Dieser Konstruktor kann nur durch abgeleitete Klassen aufgerufen werden .This constructor can be called only by classes that derive from .

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property DatagramsReceived As Long
public: abstract property long DatagramsReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: Gets the number of User Datagram Protocol (UDP) datagrams that were received.

span.span: Gets the number of User Datagram Protocol (UDP) datagrams that were received.

value.span: Ein Wert, der die Gesamtzahl der Datagramme angibt, die UDP-Benutzern übermittelt wurden.

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of datagrams that were delivered to UDP users.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Die Anzahl von dieser Eigenschaft zurückgegebene umfasst nicht Datagramme, die empfangen, jedoch nicht zustellbar waren.The number returned by this property does not include datagrams that were received but not deliverable. ## Examples Das folgende Codebeispiel zeigt die UDP-Statistiken für die angegebenen Adressfamilie.The following code example displays the UDP statistics for the specified address family. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property DatagramsSent As Long
public: abstract property long DatagramsSent { long get(); };

summary.span: Gets the number of User Datagram Protocol (UDP) datagrams that were sent.

span.span: Gets the number of User Datagram Protocol (UDP) datagrams that were sent.

value.span: Ein Wert, der die Gesamtzahl der Datagramme angibt, die gesendet wurden.

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of datagrams that were sent.

remarks.format: ## Examples Das folgende Codebeispiel zeigt die UDP-Statistik für die angegebene Internetprotokoll-Version.The following code example displays the UDP statistics for the specified Internet Protocol version. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IncomingDatagramsDiscarded As Long
public: abstract property long IncomingDatagramsDiscarded { long get(); };

summary.span: Gets the number of User Datagram Protocol (UDP) datagrams that were received and discarded because of port errors.

span.span: Gets the number of User Datagram Protocol (UDP) datagrams that were received and discarded because of port errors.

value.span: Ein Wert, der angibt, die Gesamtzahl der empfangenen UDP-Datagramme, die verworfen wurden, da keine überwachenden Anwendung an den Zielport vorhanden war.

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of received UDP datagrams that were discarded because there was no listening application at the destination port.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Um die Gesamtzahl der Datagramme zu suchen, die nicht zugestellt werden konnte, fügen Sie die Werte, die von dieser Eigenschaft zurückgegeben wurden und die Eigenschaft.To find the total number of datagrams that could not be delivered, add the values that were returned by this property and the property. ## Examples Das folgende Codebeispiel zeigt die UDP-Statistik für die angegebene Internetprotokoll-Version.The following code example displays the UDP statistics for the specified Internet Protocol version. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IncomingDatagramsWithErrors As Long
public: abstract property long IncomingDatagramsWithErrors { long get(); };

summary.span: Gets the number of User Datagram Protocol (UDP) datagrams that were received and discarded because of errors other than bad port information.

span.span: Gets the number of User Datagram Protocol (UDP) datagrams that were received and discarded because of errors other than bad port information.

value.span: Ein Wert, der angibt, die Gesamtzahl der empfangenen UDP-Datagramme Gründen als das Fehlen einer Anwendung an den Zielport nicht zugestellt werden konnte.

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of received UDP datagrams that could not be delivered for reasons other than the lack of an application at the destination port.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Um die Gesamtzahl der Datagramme zu suchen, die nicht zugestellt werden konnte, fügen Sie die Werte, die von dieser Eigenschaft zurückgegeben wurden und die Eigenschaft.To find the total number of datagrams that could not be delivered, add the values that were returned by this property and the property. ## Examples Das folgende Codebeispiel zeigt die UDP-Statistik für die angegebene Internetprotokoll-Version.The following code example displays the UDP statistics for the specified Internet Protocol version. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property UdpListeners As Integer
public: abstract property int UdpListeners { int get(); };

summary.span: Gets the number of local endpoints that are listening for User Datagram Protocol (UDP) datagrams.

span.span: Gets the number of local endpoints that are listening for User Datagram Protocol (UDP) datagrams.

value.span: Ein Wert, der die Gesamtzahl der Sockets angibt, die UDP-Datagramme empfangen werden.

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of sockets that are listening for UDP datagrams.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Sie können die und Klassen zum Erstellen von UDP-Listener-Anwendungen.You can use the and classes to create UDP listener applications. ## Examples Das folgende Codebeispiel zeigt die UDP-Statistik für die angegebene Internetprotokoll-Version.The following code example displays the UDP statistics for the specified Internet Protocol version. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#3)]
